description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.5.
Choosing option 1 leads to an equal split of the round payoff when both players choose it, promoting cooperation
The game structure incentivizes players to consider the actions of their opponent, as the payoffs vary significantly based on their choices
The outcomes suggest that mutual cooperation (both choosing option 1) yields a stable and predictable payoff, while unilateral deviation (one choosing option 2) can lead to unequal distributions
The game dynamics may encourage players to establish patterns or strategies over multiple rounds to maximize their payoffs
